snippet.title: Gran Turismo® 5 Spec 2.0 Trailer
snippet.description:
Enjoy the new opening cinematic from Gran Turismo 5, showcasing new content from the Spec 2.0 downloadable update and available premium DLC packs. 

New additions to the Gran Turismo 5 lineup seen in this stunning new trailer include the Red Bull X2011 and more than one dozen other new racing cars and racing karts, new tracks Spa-Francorchamps and Kart Space, and more. Download the free update for Gran Turismo 5, and look for the paid downloadable content on PlayStation Store to take your GT5 experience to the next level.

Learn more about the new update and available DLC at the official Gran Turismo website: http://us.gran-turismo.com/us/
